 2y 

 Report this comment [...] Dear LinkedIn Community, I am grateful to announce that I will be studying away at Columbia University in the Spring 2023 semester! I will be taking 5000 level graduate classes in statistics, mathematics, economics and computer science. I am thankful to the faculty who wrote me recommendations (Professor Nathan Pflueger and Professor William Rosenbaum) and study abroad counselor (Ms. Janna Behrens) at Amherst College. Furthermore, I extend my gratitude to Amherst College for covering all the costs for the Visiting Undergraduate Student program at Columbia Univeristy in the City of New York (CC)! I look forward to a semester full of new experiences and growth! Thank you so much Kenny C. for being my Orientation Leader! Best, Dhyey Mavani #growth #linkedin #grateful #statistics #university [...] # Dhyey Mavani‚Äôs Post

Dhyey Mavani

Generative AI @ LinkedIn | Computational Math @ Stanford, Amherst College | Ex-Amazon (AWS)

Liam Davis   5mo [...] Exploratorium‚Äîand receiving $25,000 in AWS cloud credits to support future experiments and launches. Special thanks to Jared Friedman & Diana Hu, whom I first met while interviewing for the HackMIT 2023 YC Startup Pitch Challenge. I‚Äôm especially grateful for their outreach and support in encouraging me to submit prioritized referrals‚Äîbecause of that, I got to attend with Tina Zhang, Tairan (Ryan) Ji, and Liam Davis, bringing a small but proud Amherst College presence to this global stage. It was also a full-circle moment running into Ahmed A., an Amherst alum and my very first pre-orientation leader. Above all, I‚Äôm walking away inspired‚Äîby the conversations, the community‚Äôs generosity, and the collective energy to keep building. If we met at AI Startup School or at the after-parties, [...] If we met at AI Startup School or at the after-parties, let‚Äôs stay in touch‚Äîthere‚Äôs so much more to create together. #AIStartupSchool #YCombinator #AmherstCollege #Claude4 #AWS #Anthropic #Startups #AI #TechForGood #Gratitude #MachineLearning #Innovation
